title: Typefaceof dashed lines radiating outwards
content:
I'm looking for a round typeface made up of dashed lines radiating outwards. A bit like Torture stitches (see link below) but cleaner and more precise with more lines. Any recommendations?

[http://www.linotype.com/278462/TortureStitches-product.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417043110/http:/www.linotype.com/278462/TortureStitches-product.html "http://www.linotype.com/278462/TortureStitches-product.html")
author: niallde

comments.content:
Looking at your sculptures, I can see what you're looking for... :-)

I vaguely remember something like that, but it could be an optimistic false memory. If you don't find something close enough to what you need, what are the chances you might commission a bespoke font?

hhp
Maybe search terms like weaving, sewing, stitching, thread, or similar terms (along with "font") would turn up something.
